snippet: For parents of worriers, one question looms over the discussion of why some children thrive on the stress of testing while others implode: Can we help our children feel better, as well as do better, under stress?
abstract: For parents of worriers, one question looms over the discussion of why some children thrive on the stress of testing while others implode: Can we help our children feel better, as well as do better, under stress?

headline.main: Helping a Worrier Become a Warrior
